db.query: SELECT id_pokemon, na_pokemon FROM pokemon WHERE id_pokemon = ?
UPDATE pokemon SET na_pokemon = ? WHERE id_pokemon = ?
SELECT field1, field2 FROM tableName WHERE field3 = '$value$' AND field2 = '$value$' AND field3 = $value$
DELETE tableName FROM tableName WHERE field1=$value$
UPDATE producto SET na_producto = ? WHERE id_producto = ?
